description: Region-Based Analysis Program through Bayesian Multilevel Modeling

dataTable.title: Input Data Table
dataTable.description: Data table in pure text format.

chains.title: Number of Chains
chains.description: Specify the number of Markov chains.

iterations.title: Number of Iterations
iterations.description: Specify the number of iterations per Markov chain.

eoi.title: Effects of Interest
eoi.description: Identify effects of interest in the output.

tstat.title: T-Statistic Column
tstat.description: Specify the column name that lists the t-statistic values.

stdz.title: Standardize Quantitative Variables
stdz.description: Identify quantitative variables (or covariates) to be standardized.

distROI.title: Distribution for ROIs
distROI.description: Specify the distribution for the ROIs.

distSubj.title: Distribution for Subjects
distSubj.description: Specify the distribution for the subjects.

distY.title: Distribution for Response Variable
distY.description: Specify the distribution for the response variable.

ridgePlot.title: Ridge Plot
ridgePlot.description: Plot the posterior distributions stacked together.

roi.title: Region Variable
roi.description: Specify the column name that is designated as the region variable.

subj.title: Subject Variable
subj.description: Specify the column name that is designated as the measuring unit variable (usually subject).

scale.title: Scaling Factor
scale.description: Specify a multiplier for the Y values.

se.title: Standard Error Column
se.description: This option indicates that standard error for the response variable is available as input.

pdp.title: Posterior Distribution Plot Layout
pdp.description: Specify the layout of posterior distribution plot.

mean.title: Mean Formula
mean.description: Specify the formulation for the mean of the likelihood (sampling distribution).

sigma.title: Sigma Formula
sigma.description: Specify the formulation for the standard deviation (sigma) of the likelihood (sampling distribution).

debug.title: Debug Flag
debug.description: This option will enable R to save the parameters in a file for debugging.

md.title: Missing Data Flag
md.description: This option indicates that there are missing data in the input.

r2z.title: Fisher Transformation Flag
r2z.description: Perform Fisher transformation on the response variable if it is a correlation coefficient.
